translation.en: -The Night of the Living Dead. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-活死人之夜
‎-对 ‎（安东尼·哥切尼 生物学家）

translation.en: Zombie attack. We're just trying to zombie-proof our home.
translation.zh: ‎丧尸攻击 我们要保护好家园

translation.en: Yeah, you look over the top,
you can see the zombie eyes.
You can see them.
They're right there.
They're massive.
Their head's about that big.
Let the battle commence.
Okay, I can see the bait.
[David Attenborough] The team have come to the remote islands of French Polynesia
translation.zh:
‎工作人员来到法属波利尼西亚的
‎偏远岛屿

translation.en: in the South Pacific.
Here, sharks are fully protected.
translation.zh: ‎这里 鲨鱼受到完全的保护

translation.en: This is one of the few places left
where they still thrive in the numbers they once did.
translation.zh: ‎它们还保持往昔的数量规模

translation.en: Good to go.
Divers, divers, this is topside. This is topside.
Do you copy?
[diver] Yeah, reading you loud and clear. Can you hear me?
translation.zh: ‎收到 很清晰 你听到吗？

translation.en: I can hear you loud and clear, loud and clear, over.
Enjoy your dive, and let's go find some sharks.
translation.zh: ‎好好享受 去找到鲨鱼吧

translation.en: [diver chuckles] Fingers crossed.
Finding the sharks isn't a problem.
[diver 1] Okay, here they are.
Wow.
[diver 2] Plenty of sharks.
They're gathered in the main channel,
hanging in the tidal current.
But working against such a strong current
is tough going for divers.
To film the sharks hunting at night, the crew need powerful underwater lights.
translation.zh:
‎要拍摄夜间鲨鱼猎食
‎工作组需要强力的水下照明

translation.en: They've mounted them onto a scooter to help with the current.
translation.zh: ‎它们安装在电动车上 来对抗洋流

translation.en: That's a motor underwater scooter, DPV.
Diver propulsion vehicle.
translation.zh: ‎（雷吉斯·帕撒拿 照明操作员） ‎潜水员水下推进器

translation.en: Right here are the lights.
They are attached to the front.
On this side back here you have the propeller.
It's like a torpedo with lights.
The rig is designed to light a large enough area of reef
translation.zh: ‎这个设备可以照亮一大片珊瑚礁区域

translation.en: to capture the full scale of the spectacle.
It's kind of spooky...
to see shark eyes reflecting.
The lights are working well,
so the crew descend towards the channel.
Unconcerned by the lights,
the sharks begin to hunt.
[diver 1] Wow. They're all here, right?
The divers approach cautiously,
keeping their distance from the sharks.
[diver 2] Plenty of sharks, and this is a different mood to daytime.
translation.zh:
‎这么多鲨鱼 这是和白天
‎完全不同的气氛

translation.en: Know what? These guys are switched on, they're active.
translation.zh: ‎话说 这些家伙准备行动了

translation.en: Be careful in there.
Just as the action hots up,
the lighting rig fails.
Back to the boat.
There are few species more elusive than the Siberian tiger,
translation.zh: ‎很少物种比西伯利亚虎更神出鬼没

translation.en: and the Our Planet team has come up
with a remarkable plan to film them.
[man] We're gonna be going into the hides
with the prospect of doing approximately...
800 hours...
in a small, wooden box...
translation.zh: ‎在一个小的 木制盒子里

translation.en: by the end of the shoot.
To have any chance of filming the tiger,
they'll have to live inside the heart of tiger territory themselves.
translation.zh:
‎他们要进入老虎领地的心脏地带
‎在里面独自生活

translation.en: They're using specially built hides
just big enough for one person to live in.
translation.zh: ‎大小刚好够一个人在里面生活

translation.en: So it's a bit like caravanning, um,
translation.zh: ‎有点像大篷车 ‎（保罗·斯图尔特 摄影师）

translation.en: but sort of bizarre winter caravanning
where you're looking for a place with good views of tigers.
translation.zh:
‎你要找到合适的地方
‎可以很好观察老虎

translation.en: The hides had to be placed precisely
translation.zh: ‎这个藏身点必须设于精确位置

translation.en: to afford the best view.
But perhaps some are just a little too precise.
I don't know, it's kind of like you've just moved into a new house,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 这就像是搬进新房子

translation.en: and you don't know where anything is.
But the trouble is this house is...
very, very small.
And you've got a lot of stuff here.
The camera team will live inside these hides
over the next two winters.
-All right, see you later. Bye, Paul. -Cheers. Okay, bye.
translation.zh:
‎-好的 迟点见 再见
‎-谢谢 好的

translation.en: Bye.
For six days at a time, they will never even open the door.
translation.zh:
‎每次长达六天的时间
‎他们都不会开门

translation.en: No, I'm not staying in there.
Siberian tigers have the largest territories of any cat,
translation.zh:
‎西伯利亚老虎在猫科动物中
‎有最广阔的领地

translation.en: and they are notoriously shy.
So by living in these hides,
they hope to stand a chance of being there at the right moment
translation.zh:
‎他们希望于合适的时间
‎出现在合适的地方

translation.en: without disturbing the tiger.
While the others sit patiently in their box,
translation.zh: ‎当其他人耐心在盒子里等待时

translation.en: Kieran is using the knowledge of local scientists
translation.zh: ‎基伦充分利用本地科学家的知识

translation.en: to build a network of camera traps
translation.zh: ‎建立一个遥距摄像头的网络

translation.en: across the tiger landscape.
The least comfortable thing I've ever done.
The slightest movement will trigger these cameras,
translation.zh: ‎最轻微的动作都会触发这些摄像头

translation.en: so he must return regularly to check his catch.
translation.zh: ‎所以他要定期回来检查收获

translation.en: Initial signs are not very promising.
I think it looks like more of nothing.
Damn.
An Our Planet team are in the Canadian Arctic.
translation.zh: ‎我们的摄制队在加拿大北极地区

translation.en: They've heard reports that at a few spots along the coast,
translation.zh: ‎他们听到报告 在海岸的若干地点

translation.en: and for just a couple of weeks a year,
polar bears have learned to do something extraordinary.
translation.zh: ‎北极熊会学习做一些了不起的事

translation.en: At their base camp on the Barnoin River in Quebec,
bear guide Alain shows them some tantalizing footage
translation.zh:
‎熊导游阿兰向他们展示了一些
‎诱人的视频

translation.en: from the previous year.
Forced ashore by the summer ice melt,
translation.zh:
‎因为夏季冰块融化
‎被迫上岸的北极熊

translation.en: the bears here have learned to catch fish from the rivers.
This brief feast provides them with valuable energy
translation.zh: ‎这个简短的盛宴提供了宝贵的能量

translation.en: in the increasingly long ice-free season.
There's lots of fish over there,
and something we even see the wolf fishing with them.
translation.zh: ‎我们甚至见过狼和它们一起捉鱼

translation.en: Good, expectations are pretty low, actually.
translation.zh: ‎好的 我们的期望其实很低

translation.en: Yes, exactly, yeah.
But there are only a few rivers shallow enough
translation.zh: ‎（加拿大） ‎但只有很少河流足够浅

translation.en: for the bears to catch migrating fish.
translation.zh: ‎可以让北极熊捉到迁徙的鱼类

translation.en: These are over a hundred kilometers further north,
and for the crew, only accessible by small float plane.
translation.zh: ‎摄制队只能通过小型水上飞机进入

translation.en: If you tell me we're gonna have good weather,
your chance of seeing polar bear catching char in the next two weeks
translation.zh: ‎（阿兰·勒格） ‎在两周内看到北极熊捉鱼的机会

translation.en: are just 90...
translation.zh: ‎在两周内看到北极熊捉鱼的机会 ‎会有90%…

translation.en: -Perfect. -No big deal.
Not phased by a little drizzle,
the team test their kit.
They're hoping to capture the first ever underwater footage
translation.zh:
‎（艾莱拉·马拉柳 研究员
‎肖恩·摩尔 摄影师） ‎他们希望进行有史以来
‎第一次水下拍摄

translation.en: of polar bears fishing
and have built a special camera trap for the job.
translation.zh: ‎为此准备了特别的遥距摄像头

translation.en: Yeah.
Horizon good?
No, actually, that's slightly off, I think.
Once it's working...
they get the rest of their cameras ready.
translation.zh: ‎他们还要布置其他的摄像头

translation.en: All they need to do now
is to get them in front of a polar bear.
translation.zh: ‎就是等待北极熊出现在面前

translation.en: Extensive quarter-mile to two-mile fog drizzle,
translation.zh:
‎（第3天） ‎大概0.4到3.2公里范围
‎下着毛毛细雨和有雾

translation.en: so...
non-fit weather for flying.
I mean, you're gonna fly maybe one mile
translation.zh: ‎我是说 你们飞出去3公里多

translation.en: and you run into a fog bank,
and...
you've got no visibility, you're stuck.
translation.zh: ‎你会失去可视度 完全被困住

translation.en: -Another day in camp. -Yeah.
We were thinking weighing ourselves with all our kit. We started yesterday.
translation.zh:
‎我们要看看昨天的人和设备
‎加起来有多重

translation.en: Thirty-two pounds.
The drone weighed, done.
translation.zh: ‎（兰森·韦伯 无人机机师） ‎无人机的重量 搞定

translation.en: 247, now there's 206.
Oh dear, this is not good.
I'm over weight capacity and we're maxing out this bush plane,
translation.zh:
‎我超重了 这简直是在压榨
‎这部机器的潜能

translation.en: and it looks like since I am the fattest
I'm getting left behind, and I'm not happy about it.
translation.zh: ‎看来我要留下了 我很不高兴

translation.en: Okay, let's have a look at this. What are we at?
translation.zh: ‎好了 我们看看这个 什么情况？

translation.en: We're at 226.
-What? -I know!
Too many pancakes have been eaten.
My slight concern is we've got another week.
translation.zh: ‎我有点担心 我们就剩下一周时间

translation.en: Absolutely.
Weaher dictates everything that we do, every day.
translation.zh: ‎天气决定了我们每天做什么

translation.en: In French Polynesia, good news.
translation.zh: ‎在法属波利尼西亚 有好消息

translation.en: The lighting rig is back in action.
To capture the ultimate sequence,
the crew need to get right in amongst the sharks,
and for that they need extra protection:
bite-proof chain mail suits.
If you don't use it,
you have a big chance, I think, to be bitten.
Everything is right here, from a safety point of view.
translation.zh: ‎所有东西都准备好 安全起见

translation.en: So it's no fear, it's just...
translation.zh: ‎（道格·安达逊 摄影师） ‎现在没有恐惧 只是…

translation.en: intensity, excitement, exhilaration.
Tonight the sharks are gathering in even greater numbers.
translation.zh: ‎今晚聚集的鲨鱼数量更多了

translation.en: [Anderson] Oh, that is a lot of sharks.
Using all his experience,
Doug carefully judges the moment to move closer.
translation.zh: ‎道格小心判断时机 再次靠近

translation.en: They look all right tonight. I'm gonna get in there.
translation.zh: ‎今晚它们看起来不错 我要进去了

translation.en: By remaining calm and moving slowly,
the cameramen get right in the middle
of the hunting sharks...
[Anderson] That's a lot of sharks.
...and managed to film hundreds of top predators
translation.zh: ‎能够拍摄到数百条顶级的猎食者

translation.en: in a feeding frenzy...
without becoming part of it.
[Anderson] Really great action.
Yep, wonderful.
You're really in the middle of a predation scene,
and you feel very small at the end.
Today such incredible scenes only occur
translation.zh:
‎现在这种令人赞叹的场景
‎只会在少数地方才有

translation.en: in places like French Polynesia where sharks are protected.
translation.zh:
‎像法属波利尼西亚
‎这里鲨鱼受到很好的保护

translation.en: And we could have so many sharks hunting together
translation.zh: ‎我们会见到这么多鲨鱼一起猎食

translation.en: and being so close to each other,
it's like a river flow.
It's really special.
I really like-- I'm enjoying this spot.
translation.zh: ‎我非常享受 很喜欢这个地方

translation.en: These top predators play a vital role
translation.zh: ‎这些顶级的猎食者扮演关键角色

translation.en: in the health of our coastal seas.
translation.zh: ‎对我们沿海环境的健康而言

translation.en: It's crucial that we protect sharks in all our oceans
translation.zh: ‎在我们所有的海洋保护鲨鱼至关紧要

translation.en: so they can thrive once again.
A month into filming the tigers,
and the unremarkable days are passing slowly.
Not much else to do apart from give you a tour of the hide.
translation.zh:
‎除了带你参观下藏身点
‎没别的事好做

translation.en: So let's be quick about it and very quiet.
translation.zh: ‎（第39天） ‎让我们安静 快速地过一遍

translation.en: So, here we go.
This is my big knife,
thermometer,
box of nuts,
satellite communication device,
tea, coffee,
toilet paper,
flare for, uh, frightening the tiger off,
translation.zh: ‎照明弹 这可以阻吓老虎

translation.en: if it decides to eat me.
Fat chance.
These are down booties to keep my feet warm,
translation.zh: ‎这些短靴可以保持双脚温暖

translation.en: kettle, cooker,
all my gas stuff,
bottle for peeing in.
That's the toilet there.
I sit on that about once a day just to give myself a treat.
translation.zh: ‎我每天坐一次 享受一下

translation.en: Even I'm bored now.
Two months in, and Kieran's routine checks are well under way.
translation.zh: ‎两个月了 基兰的例行检查进展顺利

translation.en: Well, it seems like the camera is still working.
There's a lot of footage on this...
card.
Question is, footage of what?
Lots of tiger food.
But still no tiger.
Cool.
We've got a... lynx.
First time we've got something like that here.
translation.zh:
‎我们第一次在这里
‎拍到这样的东西

translation.en: You know, it's not a tiger but it's a pretty cool animal.
translation.zh: ‎这虽然不是老虎 但也是很酷的动物

translation.en: But not what they're looking for.
That evening, though, Paul receives a visitor.
translation.zh: ‎那天晚上 保罗有个访客

translation.en: Well, I appear to have been surrounded by maybe two tigers.
translation.zh: ‎（第75天） ‎我似乎被两只老虎包围了

translation.en: I don't know if you can still hear that, but it's still...
still roaring out up the track,
-and it seems to be... -[tiger roaring]
...that there's another tiger also calling back.
So...
-I'm clearly in the right place. -[tiger yowling]
I just have to hope that they're still around by morning.
translation.zh: ‎我只是希望到早上它们还在附近

translation.en: That is an incredible sound.
Sadly, the two tigers are not still around the following morning.
translation.zh:
‎可惜的是 第二天早上那两只老虎
‎已经不见了

translation.en: Wow, it's beautiful.
But the scientists' camera traps confirm Paul's nighttime visitors.
translation.zh:
‎但科学家的摄像头确认了
‎保罗的夜间访客

translation.en: [man] No snoring tonight, Paul.
[Paul] No, well, draw them in.
-Stunning, eh? I like to see those. -Yeah, it's great.
translation.zh:
‎-很棒对吗？我喜欢这些
‎-是的 很棒

translation.en: Fingers crossed.
So we should see this... this tiger.
Frustratingly close, and yet still not filmable.
translation.zh:
‎已经非常接近 但让人沮丧的是
‎还是不能拍到画面

translation.en: It's their second year of filming,
and the camera trap team finds some promising signs
translation.zh: ‎摄影队找到一些有希望的迹象

translation.en: on their way to the ridge.
It's very fresh.
And it's heading in the right direction.
Kind of kept coming down the trail a bit and then it turns up into this area
translation.zh:
‎似乎沿着痕迹往下一点
‎会看到有个区域

translation.en: where there's no snow.
But it looks like the tiger continued up the ridge to where our camera traps are.
translation.zh:
‎老虎是从山脊一直到我们摄像头
‎所在的位置

translation.en: By now the team has learned through trial and error
the most likely tiger routes through the forest.
translation.zh: ‎已经大致判定老虎穿越森林的路线

translation.en: But Kieran knows through experience
that the cats are still highly sensitive to any signs of humans in their domain.
translation.zh:
‎猫科动物对于领地内的任何人类迹象
‎都保持高度敏感

translation.en: To succeed, one needs a lots of luck.
translation.zh: ‎为了成功 需要很多运气

translation.en: Finally, the camera traps are beginning to pay off.
translation.zh: ‎最终 设置的摄像头有所斩获

translation.en: Oh, man, I can't believe it.
This is, like-- this is two years of work.
Like two years of work for, like,
just minutes of footage,
and, uh...
you see a shot like this and it's just all worth it.
translation.zh: ‎看到之后 你会觉得都是值得的

translation.en: I mean, it's like the perfect setting, this ridge,
translation.zh: ‎这个环境很完美 这个山脊

translation.en: where you've got the mountains in the background, you've got nice light,
translation.zh: ‎有后面的山做背景 光线很好

translation.en: and flare going on in the lens, you have this incredible animal...
translation.zh: ‎镜头上有光晕 拍到这只神奇的动物

translation.en: Just, I don't know, I mean, it's...
Yeah, it's incredible.
There is no guarantee of success in hide work.
translation.zh: ‎这个藏身任务 并不保证就能成功

translation.en: A tiger must present itself to you,
which makes the two winters endured by the hide teams
translation.zh: ‎整个隐藏摄制队两个冬天的忍耐

translation.en: a remarkable feat of determination.
Yet thanks to the collective efforts of all involved,
translation.zh:
‎还要感谢参与其中的所有
‎合作者的努力

translation.en: we now have just a few precious images
translation.zh: ‎我们才能获取这些珍贵的影像

translation.en: of the remaining Siberian tigers on our planet.
translation.zh: ‎这是我们星球上仅存的西伯利亚虎

translation.en: Let the battle commence.
Working in a hot, steamy, mosquito-infested jungle
translation.zh: ‎在炎热 潮湿 蚊虫肆虐的丛林工作

translation.en: is testing for anyone.
It went deep there.
That's pretty deep. I think that's pretty deep.
That's what we call a hole.
But from a filming perspective,
this particular patch of rain forest
really is hell.
This is ridiculous. This is ridiculous.
But for those willing to take on the swamp,
the Suaq Reserve in Sumatra
is home to some unique animal behavior.
translation.zh: ‎是某些独特动物习性的家园

translation.en: The orangutans that live here have learned to make and use tools,
translation.zh:
‎在这里的猩猩
‎学会了制造和使用工具

translation.en: the only wild members of their species known to do so.
translation.zh:
‎是它们的物种中唯一的野生成员
‎能掌握这种技能

translation.en: Truly pristine orangutan habitat is not easy to find.
translation.zh: ‎真正原始的猩猩栖息地不容易找到

translation.en: And after three exhausting days of travel,
they get their first taste of the challenges ahead.
translation.zh: ‎他们首次感受到前路的挑战

translation.en: It sort of feels as if the whole forest floor
is knitted together.
Sometimes I think I can pick up a vine here.
translation.zh: ‎有时我想 比方说这些树藤

translation.en: If I gave it a yank, somebody would trip up, you know, 50 meters that way.
translation.zh:
‎（休·科迪 导演） ‎如果我猛拉 有人可能会在
‎50米外被绊倒

translation.en: One of the things you see everywhere are these roots,
these aerial root.
They're like croquet hoops, and they are literally all over this forest.
translation.zh: ‎它们就像槌球箍 遍布整个森林

translation.en: So you're walking along,
get your foot caught in one of those, and you're on your face pretty quickly.
translation.zh: ‎如果被绊倒 很容易就整个人扑倒

translation.en: It's not even 6:30 and I'm completely soaked.
translation.zh: ‎还没到6点半 我已经全身湿透

translation.en: All fun.
All part of humor of the wood.
You all right?
The orangutans spend all of their time up in the canopy,
translation.zh: ‎猩猩基本上都在树冠上生活

translation.en: never coming to the ground, and are constantly on the move.
translation.zh: ‎不会下地 而且不停移动

translation.en: So the big problem will be keeping up with them...
translation.zh: ‎要跟上它们 而且穿透重重枝叶

translation.en: and getting a clean shot through all the foliage.
translation.zh: ‎得到一个好的镜头 是个大问题

translation.en: Oblivious of the struggles going on down below,
translation.zh: ‎不知道下面的一系列挣扎情况

translation.en: the orangutans are in their element.
We've been charging through the understory
translation.zh: ‎我们在林下植被上固定摄像机

translation.en: trying to get shots of an orang with her baby,
and she always seems to be ten seconds in front of us.
I mean, we're always playing with seconds.
You set up the camera, you've got a few seconds to get the camera ready,
translation.zh: ‎你设置好摄影机 要花几秒钟准备

translation.en: focused, fired,
but in that time, very often she's just moved off,
translation.zh: ‎但与此同时 她可能就已经移动了

translation.en: so you get nothing.
Nothing.
translation.zh: ‎（马特·阿伯拉德 摄影师） ‎拍不到

translation.en: It's pretty much impossible.
Well, not impossible, surely.
Shall we just call it difficult?
Difficult.
Very difficult.
Matt, I've got an important question for you.
translation.zh: ‎马特 我问你个重要问题

translation.en: Yeah, what's the important question, Huw?
[Huw] So what do you think our shot per setup ratio is?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得我们拍摄的成功比是多少？

translation.en: Twenty-five to one.
[Huw] So 25 times--
Twenty-five times camera on, camera off--
Hauling the camera and tripod through the jungle.
translation.zh: ‎拖着这些摄像机和三脚架穿越丛林

translation.en: Hauling, yeah,
scratching shins...
going up to my waist in water.
[Huw] After all that, we end up with just--
translation.zh: ‎经历这些困难 我们一无所获

translation.en: Nothing. We end up with just nothing.
As the days turn to weeks...
jungle living is beginning to take its toll on Matt,
translation.zh: ‎丛林生活对马特造成了不好的影响

translation.en: and he's forced to take some unscheduled time off.
It's an enforced break.
I've got this...
It's a plant allergy, it's an allergy to a plant like a poison ivy
translation.zh:
‎这是一种植物过敏
‎就像是毒漆过敏那种情况

translation.en: or a poison oak.
And unfortunately, it's hit the whole entire back of my legs.
translation.zh: ‎不幸的是 我整条腿的后部都是

translation.en: I'm trying to give it some sun to try and dry it out out.
translation.zh: ‎我正在晒太阳 看能不能好转

translation.en: I'm not really one for sunbathing, but, you know...
translation.zh:
‎我并不是喜欢晒太阳的人
‎但现在这样…

translation.en: certain situations demand it, and this is one of them.
Finally, we have the weather to go and film polar bears.
translation.zh:
‎最终 天气情况许可
‎我们可以拍摄北极熊了

translation.en: We've been sitting here, seems like forever, maybe ten days.
translation.zh: ‎我们坐在这里等了 差不多十天

translation.en: But...
today's the day.
At last, the rain has let up enough for the team to head north.
translation.zh: ‎（第10天） ‎最后 雨势变小 团队可以出发向北

translation.en: Up in the air for the first time,
it becomes clear that all this rain has had an impact.
There's much more water everywhere than normal.
translation.zh: ‎地面上的水比平常要多很多

translation.en: Some in that area, maybe.
[woman] Bear to the left. Bear to the left.
Finally the crew spot a bear.
They make their approach on foot,
hoping at last to film their sequence.
But as they get closer,
they see all is not as it should be.
Though there are bears here, there are no signs of fishing.
translation.zh: ‎虽然有熊 但没有捉鱼的迹象

translation.en: It seems that all of this rain has filled the rivers
to levels much higher than normal,
allowing the fish to run straight upstream to the lakes
translation.zh: ‎让鱼都直接逆流而上到了湖泊

translation.en: without becoming trapped in pools along the way.
Perhaps this is why the bears aren't fishing.
Underwater, the team's fears are confirmed.
translation.zh: ‎在水下 团队的担心被证实

translation.en: At this time of year, the river should be crammed full of fish.
translation.zh: ‎在每年这个时候 河里应该挤满了鱼

translation.en: But there's nothing here for the bears to eat.
translation.zh: ‎但现在完全没有了 北极熊没有食物

translation.en: The team must finally admit that they've been defeated by the weather,
translation.zh: ‎队伍必须承认 这次被天气打败了

translation.en: and return home empty-handed.
The whole point of our freshwater film is to demonstrate how important it is
translation.zh:
‎我们淡水那部分的拍摄
‎是为了展示其重要性

translation.en: that the right amount of water hits these systems at the right time.
translation.zh:
‎需要有合适的水量在合适的时点
‎激活整个生态系统

translation.en: So this kind of demonstrates that perfectly
translation.zh: ‎但现在的情况是 错误的水量

translation.en: in that the wrong amount of water has hit the system
and the behavior that we wanted to film can't happen.
translation.zh: ‎我们想要拍摄的行为没有出现

translation.en: It's good for the fish but obviously bad for the bears and bad for us.
translation.zh:
‎这对鱼是好事
‎但对北极熊和我们则不然

translation.en: We don't have a sequence, I think, for the simple reason
translation.zh: ‎我们没拍到后续事件 原因很简单

translation.en: that the water levels are too high.
The fish aren't trapped, the bears can't feed.
translation.zh:
‎鱼没有被困在浅水处
‎北极熊也无法获取食物

translation.en: Um, we can't film what's not happening.
Very frustrating. I think everybody feels like we failed somehow.
translation.zh: ‎非常泄气 我想大家都觉得被击败了

translation.en: But it's nature. You don't win them all with nature.
translation.zh: ‎但这就是大自然 你无法赢得所有

translation.en: It's been going on here for 20 years for Alain, but this year, no.
translation.zh:
‎这种情况阿兰说已经持续20年
‎但今年没有出现

translation.en: Weather over the years in the Arctic has just been getting really weird,
translation.zh: ‎北极近些年的天气 确实很奇怪

translation.en: and this summer has just been the worse weather in the last 15 years.
translation.zh:
‎今年夏天的天气
‎似乎是过去15年最糟的

translation.en: It just basically rained all summer, you know, cloudy,
translation.zh: ‎整个夏天都下雨 而且阴天

translation.en: high water levels so the fish weren't able to get up to the...
translation.zh: ‎水位太高 所以鱼不会出现在浅水处

translation.en: were able to get up to the lakes too quickly and the bears aren't able to fish.
translation.zh:
‎直接就去到湖里
‎这样北极熊就不能获得食物

translation.en: So it's...
weird environmental climate change factors that are...
really hitting the Arctic hard and...
this is a classic example of it.
As the climate changes, the planet's weather
translation.zh: ‎随着气候变化 星球上的天气

translation.en: and the flow of its freshwater
are becoming much harder to predict.
For a film crew, this is frustrating,
translation.zh: ‎对于摄制队 这是一次挫折

translation.en: but for wildlife, this rapidly changing world
translation.zh:
‎但对于野生生物
‎这个快速变化的世界

translation.en: now threatens their very survival.
In Sumatra, the weight of expectation is still on Matt's shoulders.
translation.zh: ‎在苏门答腊 马特仍重任在肩

translation.en: He must press on with the search to find orangutans using tools.
translation.zh:
‎他加紧努力 寻找猩猩
‎使用工具的迹象

translation.en: Progress has been painfully slow so far,
but often, a month-long shoot can boil down
to just a few minutes of action.
translation.zh: ‎最终只能获得几分钟的行动片段

translation.en: Huw and Matt are hanging in there,
knowing their luck can change in an instant.
translation.zh: ‎知道他们的运气会瞬间改变

translation.en: Ah, good, good.
Yeah, good.
Whenever you hear that chucking noise...
...that's them eating ants.
So you can hear it from some distance.
Orangutans often use tools when foraging for ants.
translation.zh: ‎猩猩在猎食蚂蚁时会使用工具

translation.en: This could be the moment the crew have been waiting for.
translation.zh: ‎这可能就是摄制队等待的时刻

translation.en: Only through a small window in the foliage,
they catch their first glimpse of what they came for.
translation.zh: ‎他们终于捕捉到期待已久的画面

translation.en: A female orangutan is using a stick tool
translation.zh: ‎一只雌性猩猩正在用棍子状的工具

translation.en: to dig out ants from their nest.
translation.zh: ‎在捣鼓蚂蚁的巢穴 将蚂蚁挖出

translation.en: Tool use by animals is extremely rare,
even amongst our closest relatives.
translation.zh: ‎即使对于亲缘最近的猩猩来说

translation.en: This is a groundbreaking moment for the team.
translation.zh: ‎这对摄制队而言是突破性时刻

translation.en: [Matt] It's an incredible thing to see and witness.
translation.zh: ‎能目击这一切感觉非常神奇

translation.en: I'm pretty blown away by the fact that we've actually got this, you know?
It's been a slog, but it's been worth it.
translation.zh: ‎花了这么多工夫和时间 现在都值了

translation.en: The swampy conditions that made life very difficult for the crew
translation.zh: ‎沼泽般泥泞的状况 让摄制队很艰难

translation.en: are also the very thing that has protected this small patch of rain forest
translation.zh:
‎但也是这个因素
‎能保护这一小片雨林

translation.en: from exploitation.
Today, this area supports the highest density
translation.zh:
‎现在 这个地区支撑了地球上
‎最高密度的

translation.en: of Sumatran orangutans anywhere in the world,
and it's thought to be the only viable population that's left.
translation.zh: ‎被认为是仅存的可以进行繁殖的数量

translation.en: In just a few decades,
well over 50% of Sumatra's rain forest has been lost.
translation.zh: ‎苏门答腊超过一半的雨林已经被毁

translation.en: What remains could be gone
within the lifetime of these individuals.
The Store Glacier in Greenland,
the location of Our Planet's most nerve-wracking shoot...
translation.zh: ‎这是我们节目最头痛的拍摄地点

translation.en: The ice face stands 100 meters above the ocean's surface
translation.zh: ‎这个冰川大概在水平面上100米高

translation.en: and extends 400 meters below it.
In summer, skyscraper-size blocks break off,
translation.zh: ‎在夏天 摩天大楼般的冰块会分离

translation.en: and all that submerged ice comes racing to the surface.
In the three-week filming window, this might only happen once.
translation.zh:
‎在三周的拍摄周期内
‎可能只会出现一次

translation.en: But these ice falls mean the glacier is shifting,
translation.zh: ‎但冰块的掉落 意味着冰川在移动

translation.en: and may calve very soon.
A transport helicopter has delivered the land-based team.
translation.zh: ‎运输直升机将陆上摄制队投放到位

translation.en: But the aerial's team in another helicopter are delayed.
translation.zh:
‎但另一架直升机上的空中摄制队
‎延误了

translation.en: All they can do is set up camp and wait.
With 24-hour daylight,
a calving event is filmable anytime day or night.
translation.zh: ‎冰川崩离的景象 无论何时都能拍摄 ‎（余下20个拍摄日）

translation.en: [Sophie] More bits, just.
Yeah, and down over there too.
It's got to go.
Yeah.
[Sophie] So it's now nearly midnight.
It's still bright daylight.
And if the light wasn't enough to keep you awake,
you just hear all these sounds,
and I think they sound even louder when you're in your tent.
translation.zh: ‎你在帐篷里会觉得这种声音更响

translation.en: Dash outside and everything goes quiet. As soon as you come back in the tent...
translation.zh:
‎你跑到外面 一切归于平静
‎但你回到帐篷之后

translation.en: -Like that. -[glacier rumbling]
They're seeing more and more ice falls.
translation.zh: ‎他们看到越来越多的冰块跌落

translation.en: But the aerial team still haven't arrived.
But today the sun's out and the glacier has woken up.
translation.zh: ‎今天太阳出来 然后冰川也苏醒了 ‎（余下13个拍摄日）

translation.en: So we've been waiting on tenterhooks a bit in case it calves before they get here.
translation.zh:
‎我们一直在焦急等待
‎怕冰川在他们到达前就崩解

translation.en: It's building up.
Helicopters aren't always needed to get a camera in the air.
translation.zh: ‎（加利福利亚湾 墨西哥） ‎在空中拍摄 并不总是需要直升飞机

translation.en: The teams turn to a different solution on the high seas.
translation.zh: ‎摄制队在公海上用了其他办法

translation.en: Thank you.
Yeah, that's it, the bait.
Okay, I can see the bait, you're good.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我能看到诱饵 很好

translation.en: Exposure looks good.
Moving now. Keep the bait. There they go.
translation.zh: ‎现在移动 固定好诱饵 来了

translation.en: [man] Okay, dropping it.
Wildlife spectacles in the open ocean are unpredictable
translation.zh:
‎野生动物在公开海域的壮观场面
‎很难预判

translation.en: and very short-lived.
Filming these from the air has always been a challenge
translation.zh: ‎从空中拍摄这些画面 是一大挑战

translation.en: because helicopters can't venture far from land.
translation.zh: ‎因为直升飞机不能远离陆地

translation.en: [man] Keep up with the bait.
Hold it there. I'm gonna come back towards the boat.
translation.zh: ‎保持住 准备回到船上了

translation.en: -Yeah, it's going up top, isn't it? -Yeah.
Now, with the very latest drones...
translation.zh: ‎现在 有了最新的无人机

translation.en: -Drop in a bit more. -Nice?
Looks amazing.
...we can at last get an aerial perspective
translation.zh: ‎我们最终可以获得一个空中视觉

translation.en: on these fleeting events
out on the high seas.
So it's the first time we've got a drone that's fast enough
translation.zh: ‎我们第一次有足够速度的无人机

translation.en: and small enough and practical to launch from a boat.
translation.zh: ‎（晓治·皮尔逊 导演） ‎而且小而实用 能从船上起飞

translation.en: So when we're out here miles and miles offshore,
it really is opening up a whole host of opportunities for us, which is really exciting.
translation.zh:
‎这为我们创造了大量机会
‎这很让人兴奋

translation.en: The team have come to Mexico's Gulf of California,
translation.zh: ‎摄制队来到墨西哥的加利福利亚湾

translation.en: one of the best places in the world to see blue whales.
translation.zh: ‎这是世上观察蓝鲸最棒的地方

translation.en: A blue whale.
It's our first blue whale. We've just...
We spotted it a second ago. It's absolutely enormous.
translation.zh: ‎刚才发现的 这真的是无比巨大

translation.en: That's quite an obvious thing to say about a blue whale, but...
translation.zh:
‎对于蓝鲸这基本上是第一个
‎想到的形容

translation.en: it is a huge, huge whale.
Whoa.
Whoa.
Oh, my God!
There it is, it's up.
It's a good start, but the crew have a more ambitious goal:
translation.zh:
‎这是个好开始
‎但摄制队有更大的目标

translation.en: to film a blue whale mother and her calf from the air.
translation.zh: ‎要从空中拍摄蓝鲸母亲和幼鲸

translation.en: Drone's ready, let's go.
Filming is a two-man operation.
Hector flies the drone and Olly operates the camera.
translation.zh:
‎赫克托负责无人机飞行
‎奥利负责摄像头

translation.en: They have to get the drone in position
then work out the best altitude and orientation for the shot.
translation.zh: ‎然后研究拍摄的最佳高度和方向

translation.en: [Olly] Hold it there.
Blue whales only surface for two to three minutes at the time
translation.zh: ‎蓝鲸只会露出水面两到三分钟

translation.en: before diving for up to 15 minutes.
It's a narrow window for everything to come together.
translation.zh: ‎要准备好一切 时间要求很紧

translation.en: -Can't see it. -There.
[Olly] Don't twist too much into the sun.
The light's so bright.
Too much. Okay, let's start again.
[Hector] Ah, she's diving.
So fast.
She's gone.
[Jamie] This is the little room.
Cold store, makeshift filming,
and a bucket...
We poo in a bucket.
It's the glamour.
That's Hector, Patrick,
Anatoly, Evgeny, Max...
translation.zh: ‎安东尼 叶夫根尼 马克思

translation.en: This is where we eat, sleep,
dry things, get warm.
translation.zh: ‎让东西干燥 保暖的地方

translation.en: This is where everyone sleeps.
One, two, three people sleep in there.
translation.zh: ‎一 二 三个人睡在这里

translation.en: It's luxurious.
[Sophie] Is that it? Is that the tour?
That's the tour, yeah. There's nothing else.
translation.zh: ‎是的 参观就这样 没别的东西

translation.en: Then there's outside. There's a lot more outside.
translation.zh: ‎然后是外面 外面有很多

translation.en: The Night of the Living Dead.
Yeah.
Zombie attack. We just started to zombie-proof our home.
translation.zh: ‎丧尸攻击 我们要保护好家园

translation.en: [Jamie] Zombies.
[Jamie] It's the middle of the night and we've just been woken up by...
translation.zh: ‎现在是午夜 我们被吵醒

translation.en: The hut has been absolutely surrounded by walrus.
Every little hole you can look out of, where the generator goes out,
translation.zh:
‎你可以看到很多小洞
‎发电机也关掉了

translation.en: the crack in the door,
there's another hole out that way,
we're completely surrounded by walrus. It's amazing.
translation.zh: ‎我们完全被海象包围了 真神奇

translation.en: You hear banging against the sides of the hut. Hut feels like it's shaking.
translation.zh:
‎你可以听到两边都有拍击声
‎感觉小屋在摇晃

translation.en: You can hear their tusks on the wall.
It's quite amazing.
It's really exciting because we wanted them to come.
translation.zh: ‎让人兴奋的是 我们希望它们过来

translation.en: So yeah, it's brilliant.
It's like being surrounded by 50,000 Wookiees.
translation.zh: ‎就像是被五万名伍基人包围一样

translation.en: If we didn't know what they were that would be really scary.
translation.zh:
‎如果不知道它们是什么
‎就真的很吓人

translation.en: When the team came to Russia
to film the largest gathering of walrus on the planet,
translation.zh: ‎拍摄全球最大的海象聚集地

translation.en: theyt never expected them to come knocking on their door.
translation.zh: ‎他们没想到会遇到海象来敲门

translation.en: The beach is absolutely jam packed full.
The problem with that is that the cabin is completely surrounded.
translation.zh: ‎问题是整个小屋都被包围了

translation.en: There's just walrus everywhere.
With walrus blocking all exits,
there was only one place suitable for filming.
The cabin's surrounded so we have to film on the roof.
We had every form of weather from sunshine to snow to hail.
translation.zh:
‎各种天气情况都有 阳光
‎下雪还有冰雹

translation.en: Seen all weather in a day here.
Rooftop filming in bad weather has its limitations.
translation.zh: ‎在恶劣天气 屋顶拍摄有局限性

translation.en: What the team was really waiting for
was an opportunity to get the drone in the air.
translation.zh: ‎一个合适的机会可以让无人机上天

translation.en: We've got a break in the weather and there's walrus everywhere
translation.zh: ‎现在天气稍微好转 到处都是海象

translation.en: and a gap, a break in the walrus as well.
We're gonna try to get the drone in the air and show the spectacle.
translation.zh:
‎我们打算让无人机起飞
‎拍摄这个壮观的景象

translation.en: Yeah, straight along the shoreline.
Numbers are unbelievable.
Tens of thousands of walrus, as far as you can see.
The whole beach is full, the cliffs are full.
translation.zh: ‎整个海滩都是满的 悬崖也是

translation.en: There's thousands in the water.
It's only from the air that you can truly see the scale of this spectacle.
translation.zh: ‎只有在天空上才能看到这个盛况

translation.en: Over 100,000 individuals hauled out on one beach.
translation.zh: ‎超过十万只海象 在一个海滩

translation.en: There's no walrus left.
Overnight they've all gone.
I can't believe it goes from 80,000 walrus,
every single inch of beach has been covered,
translation.zh: ‎占据了整个海滩的每一个角落

translation.en: to just empty.
In one night. Amazing.
translation.zh: ‎一个晚上的事情 真神奇

translation.en: Oh, there he is.
He's up, yeah.
-You taking off? -That's us.
Okay, forward.
There he is.
-Okay, go hard left. -Hard left.
translation.zh:
‎-好的 猛往左转
‎-猛往左转

translation.en: Hard left.
In these ideal conditions,
and with the whales unconcerned by our drone,
the crew are able to capture intimate close-up images.
translation.zh: ‎摄制队能拍到这些亲密的特写画面

translation.en: -Yeah, rolling. Move right. -Move right.
translation.zh:
‎-对 拍摄中 去右边
‎-右边

translation.en: Yeah, hold it.
They even managed to film a blue whale feeding...
translation.zh: ‎他们甚至拍到了蓝鲸在喂食

translation.en: ...its extended throat full of water and krill.
translation.zh: ‎一直到喉部 满是水和磷虾

translation.en: He is feeding there.
-Forward a bit. -Slow.
Sounds like he's quite close.
Wow.
Just got a big wide of a feeding whale.
translation.zh:
‎我们拍到了一条在喂食的鲸鱼
‎看到了全貌

translation.en: Whoa. Let's go.
Keep rolling. It's good.
Yeah.
Mom and calf, mom and calf, let's go. Let's go.
-Yeah. -Ready?
Yeah.
That's it. Come up, move left.
translation.zh: ‎就这个 往上 左边一点

translation.en: -Left. -Nice.
Don't twist.
Keep going forward.
Yeah, keep to the left.
Okay. Oh, beautiful.
I'm gonna hold the shot there. Gonna hold.
translation.zh: ‎我要这个角度拍 保持住

translation.en: Okay, holding.
Yeah, that's nice, it's beautiful.
Let's just keep gently into him. Just keep, this is the shot, don't worry.
translation.zh:
‎我们慢慢接近 保持住 拍到了
‎别担心

translation.en: Coming back. Coming back just real gently with him.
translation.zh: ‎回来 回来 慢慢跟着他

translation.en: Beautiful. That's the one.
She's coming straight at the drone. Let's get lined up on her.
translation.zh:
‎它向着无人机过来
‎我们和它保持直线

translation.en: You can see its face.
Whoa. That's lovely.
Seeing some of the calf, and seeing its face
and seeing it dip under Mom and come back out
translation.zh: ‎它藏在母亲下面 然后又出来

translation.en: and that sort of behavior was...
yeah, I think that's definitely the winner.
Yeah, that was pretty special.
With their innovative use of drones,
translation.zh: ‎通过对无人机的创新性使用

translation.en: the team were able to capture these rare intimate moments...
translation.zh: ‎摄制队能拍到这些罕见的亲密瞬间

translation.en: revealing a new tender side
translation.zh: ‎揭示了地球上最大型的动物

translation.en: to the largest animal that has ever lived.
At the glacier, the sound everyone has been waiting for.
translation.zh: ‎（格陵兰岛西部） ‎在冰川处 大家都在等待的声音

translation.en: And not a moment too soon.
Hello, Jamie. How are you?
Welcome to Store.
[Jamie] Yeah, beautiful.
But with the aerial team finally in place,
the glacier's activity drops without warning.
All they can do is wait,
and hope it calves before their time runs out.
translation.zh: ‎希望能在时间用完前 看到冰川崩解

translation.en: [man] Everything's gonna come together. Sun's gonna come out,
translation.zh: ‎所有东西都准备好了 ‎太阳会出来

translation.en: the ice is gonna calve, and we're gonna capture it all on film.
translation.zh: ‎冰川会崩解 我们会拍下这些画面

translation.en: On the last day.
It's usually what happens.
Yep, that's another bit coming up from the bottom.
translation.zh: ‎是的 底部又有一块上来了

translation.en: [Sophie] More to the right.
-Where? -Right, to the right of that bit.
-We've got bits on the-- -Oh, look. That bit.
I'd get on the wide, if I were you.
[man] Wow! Look at that one.
Rising up, that pillar.
Okay, we're good to go.
[man] Okay, Mateo, let us know what you see.
translation.zh: ‎好的 马迪奥 让我们知道你看到什么

translation.en: Okay, we'll let you know if there's any activity on the nose. Over.
translation.zh: ‎好 我们会告知下面的活动情况 完毕

translation.en: Okay, I'm going in for details. Are you on the wide?
translation.zh: ‎好 我去拍细部镜头 你们负责全景？

translation.en: Okay, just go straight ahead.
Does it look like that bit above the arch is gonna go?
translation.zh: ‎是不是拱门上方那一块要掉下来了？

translation.en: They must get close to film.
I don't wanna be this close to the wall ahead.
translation.zh: ‎我不想这么靠近前面这堵冰墙

translation.en: But how close is too close?
Okay, let's try and get above this now.
translation.zh: ‎好 我们现在尝试往上越过它

translation.en: [man] Let's just get a bit higher.
With the pilot dodging truck-sized ice blocks,
translation.zh: ‎飞行员躲避着卡车大小的冰块

translation.en: it's clear something much bigger is about to happen.
[man] Jamie, camera left.
The whole face is going.
translation.zh: ‎（余下1小时拍摄） ‎整个正面都崩解了

translation.en: A kilometer of ice breaks off the front.
translation.zh: ‎前面大概一公里的冰块脱落

translation.en: And half a kilometer of underwater ice
starts rushing to the surface.
[man] Jean Michel, get us in as close as you think you can.
translation.zh: ‎尚·米歇尔 尽量带我们靠近

translation.en: [Jamie] Okay, hold this line, as steady as you can go.
translation.zh: ‎好的 保持这条线路 稳住

translation.en: That's great.
Can we get a little bit lower?
Yeah, that's really good.
[man] Jean Michel, pull up. Up! Up!
The pilot must navigate around 75 million tons of ice
crashing about the bay.
[man] Wider, wider, wider.
[Jamie] Yeah, that's really good.
Okay, let's try and get around this if we can.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我们再绕一圈 可以的话

translation.en: [Jamie] Can we slide left from this?
Looks amazing.
Unbelievable. I've never seen anything like it.
translation.zh: ‎难以置信 从未看过这样的

translation.en: [man] We're just gonna work around the icebergs.
We need you to let us know if there's more calving.
translation.zh:
‎我们想你看看 还有没有更多
‎崩解的场景

translation.en: Yeah, we will do but... [bleep] hell.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我们会的 但是…

translation.en: That was unbelievable.
How was it from the helicopter?
[laughs] Oh, [bleep] amazing.
It was like a video game, honestly.
translation.zh: ‎就像是电视游戏 老实说

translation.en: It was just like around that bit there and there was like a whole mountain
translation.zh: ‎在那边的一块 然后整座山

translation.en: rising out of the sea and then flipping over and then turning.
translation.zh: ‎好像从海里升起 然后翻过来转过去

translation.en: Did you see, we went high, it's calved?
translation.zh:
‎你看到我们飞到高处
‎是不是崩解了？

translation.en: -We get the plan view. -Yeah.
-And we were looking in... -And then we saw--
...something came, it was just a whole face was collapsing.
translation.zh: ‎有大动作 整个正面都塌了

translation.en: We just came in on absolute--
-[Sophie] I saw that, yeah. -That second calving was just immense.
translation.zh:
‎-我看到了 对的
‎-第二次的崩解很大规模

translation.en: And it just came up to the left of the helicopter.
-[Jamie] I forgot about that, yeah. -And he was going, "Wider!"
translation.zh:
‎-我忘了
‎-他就说 拉远一点

translation.en: [man] Were you pulling back, or what, at the time?
At some point I needed to because I saw, actually, an iceberg in the mirror.
translation.zh:
‎某一刻确实是的
‎因为我在镜子里看到冰山

translation.en: And then he said, "Pull up! Pull up! Pull up! Whoa!"
translation.zh: ‎然后他说 赶紧拉起来！哇！

translation.en: I could just hear Adam, "Come here, okay, camera left, no!"
translation.zh:
‎我只能听到亚当说 过来
‎左边摄像头 不！

translation.en: Jamie in the back, "Oh, my God! This is...! Oh, my God!
translation.zh: ‎杰米在后面 我的天！我的天！

translation.en: The most amazing thing I've ever seen, let alone filmed.
translation.zh:
‎这是我看过最神奇的景象
‎不用说还要拍摄了

translation.en: Yeah, it's worth it.
-Absolutely fantastic. -Yeah.
Oh, boy.
Right, kettle's on.
Oh, boy.
On the Russian coast,
the polar celebrities have turned up.
This, polar bear country.
Luckily, Russian walrus biologist Anatoly Kochnev
translation.zh:
‎幸好 俄罗斯海象生物学家‎
‎安东尼·哥切尼

translation.en: is no novice when it comes to fending off polar bears...
translation.zh: ‎在躲避北极熊方面不是新手

translation.en: and has developed his own unique way of dealing with them:
translation.zh: ‎他有自己的独门秘技来应付

translation.en: a long stick.
I stick and he staying in...
translation.zh: ‎我往前刺 它会站在原地

translation.en: around stick.
Yeah.
Yes. See, and...
I'm the polar bear.
Yeah.
A little bit worried that all we've got is a stick when there's 12 bears
translation.zh:
‎唯一担心的是 我们只有一根棍子
‎那边有12只熊

translation.en: that you can see from here.
But I trust Anatoly.
My trust in science.
Let's go.
[Sophie] So I'm not sure I wanna go now.
Anatoly's stick technique,
combined with years of experience reading bears,
translation.zh: ‎融合了对北极熊多年的了解

translation.en: appears to be keeping them at bay.
[Jamie] They're all fat and happy so...
we haven't had any bears here that aren't really chilled out,
and they just walk straight past you, totally ignore us.
translation.zh: ‎它们就这样走过你 完全无视我们

translation.en: If anything, when they get a scent of you, they tend to move away a bit,
translation.zh:
‎而且如果它们闻到你的气味
‎会走开一点

translation.en: give you a bit of distance but, no, they're really chilled out.
translation.zh: ‎和你保持一点距离 它们真的很放松

translation.en: With the bears relaxed, the team could turn their attention to the walrus
translation.zh:
‎既然北极熊表现放松
‎摄制队可以集中注意力在海象身上

translation.en: that had started to come ashore.
But they never expected what was to follow.
translation.zh: ‎但他们没想到接下来发生的事

translation.en: Walrus climbing to the very top of the cliffs
to get away from the crush below.
I don't understand. Why are they going up there?
translation.zh: ‎我不明白 它们为何爬上去？

translation.en: Like...
literally to the top of the rockiest part of the cliff.
translation.zh: ‎它们在山崖上最陡峭的位置

translation.en: Once at the top of the 80-meter cliffs they rest,
translation.zh: ‎它们在80米高的悬崖顶部休息

translation.en: until it's time to return to the sea in search of food.
translation.zh: ‎为了觅食它们会再次回到海里

translation.en: [Sophie] That last little section is the steep bit, and they all just...
translation.zh: ‎最后那小部分 真的很陡峭 它们…

translation.en: It's really steep. That bit.
translation.zh: ‎真的很陡峭 那一小片地方

translation.en: Oh, God.
Gently.
[Jamie] One's gonna go.
There's one right on the edge.
It's the worst thing I've ever filmed. They're not designed to climb cliffs.
translation.zh: ‎这是我拍过最糟糕的画面 ‎它们就不应该爬上去

translation.en: It's the least evolutionary stable strategy I've ever seen.
translation.zh: ‎这不是进化所带来的稳定变化

translation.en: I don't understand it at all.
It's just so horrible.
It's just un...
You can't fathom why, how...
It can see the walrus out at sea and it just wants to go straight to them.
translation.zh:
‎它可以看到海里的同伴
‎可能想去找它们

translation.en: And it has no concept of...
falling, I think, I don't know what it is.
translation.zh: ‎会跌下去 我想 我不知道

translation.en: Still really depressing, but today, I'm just really annoyed
translation.zh: ‎我还是很低落 但今天真的很生气

translation.en: at how ridiculous it is that they just--
They're not being pushed, there's no stampede. It calmly walked off a cliff.
translation.zh:
‎它们不是被推倒或被踩踏
‎就这样平静走下悬崖

translation.en: [Jamie] There's probably two or three hundred dead walrus
translation.zh: ‎大概有两百或者三百死的海象

translation.en: on, like, a half mile stretch of beach here.
They're exhausted 'cause they're having to swim 100 miles
translation.zh: ‎它们累坏了 因为要游泳160多公里

translation.en: to get food and then come back here 'cause it's the only place to sleep.
translation.zh:
‎去获得食物 然后回到这个地方
‎只有这里可以休息

translation.en: They used to sleep on the ice, dive down, eat the food, sleep on the ice, easy.
translation.zh:
‎它们以前在冰面上休息 下潜 觅食
‎然后回到冰面 很容易

translation.en: Now they're swimming a hundred miles, coming to this place, climbing cliffs,
translation.zh:
‎但是现在它们要游一百多公里
‎回到这地方 爬上悬崖

translation.en: and they're exhausted and falling down and...
are either being killed falling or just crushing each other
translation.zh: ‎要么跌死 要么相互踩踏而死

translation.en: 'cause there's several thousand crammed onto little tiny bits of beaches,
translation.zh:
‎因为有成千上万的海象
‎在这么小一个海滩上

translation.en: and then polar bears just have a field day.
They're not being attacked by polar bears. They just fall to their death.
translation.zh:
‎但它们都还没被北极熊攻击
‎它们就跌死了

translation.en: Completely on their own now 'cause they can't get down the cliffs.
translation.zh:
‎这就是自杀
‎因为它们没法从悬崖下来

translation.en: They're clearly not designed to climb cliffs.
[Sophie] This is the sad reality of climate change.
translation.zh: ‎这就是气候变化带来的悲惨现实

translation.en: They'd be on the ice right now if they could be.
translation.zh: ‎如果可以的话 它们应该在冰面上

translation.en: But there's no option but to come to land.
translation.zh: ‎但它们别无选择 只能上岸

translation.en: And they're just a danger to themselves.
It's really hard to watch and witness this.
It's just...
Thing is, it's not like a...
a quick death, they just, like, tumble...
and they get internal injuries and they just lie here.
translation.zh:
‎它们就是跌倒 受到内伤
‎然后躺在那里

translation.en: It's just so heart-breaking.
Really sad.
Please visit ourplanet.com
to discover how our planet can thrive again.
translation.zh:
‎了解更多如何让我们的家园
‎再次繁荣兴盛的内容
